The video was posted on Facebook on May: 2020 and has been viewed more than 3,000 times.
The post: s Indonesian-language caption translates to English as "Alhamdulillah saudi has announced the end of the lockdown period which means the gate of umrah and hajj would be reopened."
The Saudi government announced on May 26: 2020, to partially ease nationwide curfews for two weeks, but 24-hour lockdowns remained in some areas, including Mecca and quarantined neighborhoods of Medina.
A reverse image search on Google found t: longer clip uploaded on YouTube on April 27, 2020, with the video's Arabic title translating to English as "Dubai celebrating zero corona cases."
